COPY.LABEL: Copy
COPY.HELP_ITEM.TOOLTIP: Create a new Help Item with the data

MESSAGE.HELP_ITEM_ALREADY_EXIST: A Help Item with that ID already exists
MESSAGE.HELP_ITEM.CREATE_OK: The Help Item was created successfully
MESSAGE.HELP_ITEM.CREATE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Help Item was not created.

MESSAGE.HELP_ITEM_OK: The Help Item was deleted successfully
MESSAGE.HELP_ITEM_NOK: An error has occurred. The Help Item was not deleted.

MESSAGE.HELP_ITEM_OK: The Help Item was saved successfully
MESSAGE.HELP_ITEM_NOK: An error has occurred. The Help Item was not saved.

MESSAGE.HELP_ITEM.EXPORT_NOK: An error has occurred. Help Items were not exported.

MESSAGE.HELP_ITEM.IMPORT_NOK: An error has occurred. Help Items were not imported.

INTERNAL.OPERATOR_MESSAGE: This Help Item was created by automation. All changes will be lost on the next deployment.

TOOLTIPS.CREATION_USER: ID of the user of the creation
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_USER: ID of the user of the last change
TOOLTIPS.OPERATOR: If set, the Help Item cannot be deleted and all changes will be lost during the next deployment.

TOOLTIPS.HELP_ITEM_ID: Unique ID for a Help Item of the Application. Must have been used within the respective page.
TOOLTIPS.BASE_URL: Base part of the Help Item URL - the base path to the documentation of the Application
TOOLTIPS.RESOURCE_URL: Last part of the Help Item URL specific to the page (resource)

HELP_SEARCH.SUBHEADER: Searching and Managing of Help Items
HELP_SEARCH.SEARCH_TOOLTIP: Search for the Help Items with given criteria
HELP_SEARCH.MSG_SEARCH_VALIDATION: Application ID is required for search

HELP_DETAIL.UPDATE_SUCCESSFUL: The Help Item was successfully updated
HELP_DETAIL.UPDATE_ERROR: The Help Item could not be updated
HELP_DETAIL.VALIDATION_ERROR: The Help Item form is invalid. The Help Item cannot be saved this way.

HELPITEM_CREATION.CREATION_SUCCESS: The Help Item was sucessfully created.
HELPITEM_CREATION.CREATION_FAILED: The Help Item could not be created
HELPITEM_CREATION.VALIDATION_ERROR: The Help Item form is invalid. The Help Item cannot be saved this way.

NO_HELP_ITEM.CONTENT: No Help Item has been defined for this page.
NO_HELP_ITEM.ITEM_HINT: The Help Item ID for this page is:

HELP_ITEM_EDITOR.LABEL: Edit Help Item for this page
HELP_ITEM_EDITOR.TOOLTIP: Edit Help Item for this page
HELP_ITEM_EDITOR.OPEN_HELP_PAGE_EDITOR_ERROR: Cannot edit the Help Item. Help Item ID or Application Name missing.
HELP_ITEM_EDITOR.SAVE_ERROR: Form is not valid. Cannot update the Help Item.

ERRORS.PATTERN_ERROR: Your input does not match the required pattern

HTTP_STATUS_0.HELP_ITEM: Unknown problem retrieving Help Item data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_401.HELP_ITEM: You are not authorized to see Help Items.

HTTP_STATUS_403.HELP_ITEM: You have no permissions to see Help Items.

HTTP_STATUS_404.HELP_ITEM: No Help Items could be found.

HTTP_STATUS_500.HELP_ITEM: Unknown server problem retrieving Help Item data - please try again.
